import React, {useState} from 'react' import logo from '../images/res-logo.png' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import '../styles/header.css' const Header = () => { const [displayed, setDisplay] = useState(false) const navigate = useNavigate(); const displayUser = () => { setDisplay(current => !current) console.log(displayed) } const signOut = () => { navigate('/Ownerlogin') } const profilePage = () => { navigate('/ownerProfile') } return (
